com.jcatalog.grailsflow.model.view
[Groovy] Class SelectBoxView

java.lang.Object
  com.jcatalog.grailsflow.model.view.VariableView
      com.jcatalog.grailsflow.model.view.SelectBoxView

class SelectBoxView
extends VariableView

SelectBox view displays selectbox for selecting variable value. Values for selectbox are taken from items property.

Authors:
Maria Voitovich
